评论详情: A lot thinner than I needed -

For $28 I don’t expect insane quality but I do expect that the pants would be thicker than a sheet of paper, which is not the case. They are a viscose and polyester blend that looks and feels cheap. The waist fit perfectly and they are comfortable, however the legs are abnormally wide and make everything look awkward. I’m 20 so currently fashion trends aren’t lost on me but these are just not it.

I like the material soft and comfy.  The waist is tight and the legs not so tight.  Def for a curvy petit girlI’m normally between a curvy small and an avg Medium.  The medium fits almost too perfect. I’d even consider a Large on this one and I’m 145lbs at 5’3
Perfect for girls with thick bums and smaller waist
I'm 5'2 110 lbs ordered xs .... I love the baggy look .. even tho I wish there were more pockets but I love this style. Can't wait to order more
The zipper broke right when I put them on
I'm 5'2 and bought an XS. I could wear this like a jumpsuit if I wanted to - the pants come up to my chest. Unfortunately not an option for petite people
Short but baggy needs to be longer

These pants were not as described nor did they look like the picture they very wide at the bottom loose fitting and they came wrinkly like somebody momma folded them and threw them to the side don’t like at all.
Nice pants , granddaughter doesn't wear pink they looked good on me just a bit big. I will buy again but xs
Get a size smaller
I like the fabric because it is light, soft, and stretchy. The pants are comfortable and I love the pockets. They run small. I had to order a large when I normally wear a medium.
So much better than I expected for the price! I am 5'10" 175 lbs and they were long and wide enough.

I was excited for these pants. Was going to wear them for my bday tomorrow but they are cheap and the fabric is bad. They came SO wrinkled. I got a large and I’m 5’10, 170lbs, large is definitely a good fit. But  i wouldn’t order again.

I bought these pants for work. I needed something light, but functional and cute! I absolutely loved them, except the zipper would not stay up. I've washed them a few times and now the zipper is off the track after about 3 wears. I wish they were better quality because I really liked these pants.
Wonderful
They kind of bunch up a little weird in the back but cute otherwise

评论概述: Poor quality material, not as described
评论详情: Returned item

评论概述: Cute, but not a good fit
评论详情: I actually returned these. The color was very cute, but they were too tight to button around the waist and they are a bit long, but I like long.. The button on these are also very loose and could fall off easily
I absolutely love these! They are comfy and cute! You can wear them casual or as a night out. Definitely want to order the pink ones now. I’m 5’6 and about 165lbs and got XL.
